description: Comprehensive Redux state management architecture analysis for CRUD operations across 15 modules

workstreams.name: Redux Slice Inventory and Analysis
tasks: Read all 15 Redux slice files - DONE
Identify existing thunks (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE) - DONE
Analyze state shape and normalization patterns - DONE

workstreams.name: CRUD Pattern Analysis
tasks: Evaluate optimistic vs pessimistic update patterns - DONE

workstreams.name: Non-Redux Module Analysis
tasks: Analyze local state usage patterns - DONE

workstreams.name: Migration Strategy
tasks: Define migration approach for missing thunks - DONE

decisions.decision: Identified 15 Redux slices and 4 non-Redux modules
decisions.rationale: Scanned pages directory and matched with store configuration

decisions.decision: Documented CRUD gaps: 12 missing CREATE, 14 missing UPDATE, 15 missing DELETE
decisions.rationale: Analyzed all thunks in extraReducers sections

decisions.decision: Recommended keeping 3 non-Redux modules as local state, migrating notifications to Redux
decisions.rationale: Evaluated cross-module state needs and real-time update requirements

decisions.decision: Created standardized thunk patterns based on incident-response module
decisions.rationale: incident-response has the most complete CRUD implementation (CREATE, UPDATE)

decisions.decision: Prioritized UPDATE operations as highest priority (Edit pages exist but don't function)
decisions.rationale: TODO comments in ThreatIntelligenceEdit and IncidentResponseEdit indicate user-facing incomplete features
